currentTask: Session complete - Interlingo fully deployed to production
nextSteps: Set up Supabase authentication for login functionality
Connect real database data to replace dashboard mock data
Consider adding CI/CD pipeline for automatic deployments
criticalLearnings: NEVER push to remote without explicit user authorization
Git safety violation: Always ask before git push
Proper workflow: Commit locally → Ask permission → Push only when authorized
